content: Check out HL7 AU Patient Administration space for details of past and upcoming meetings and web conferences + draft material. Self sign-up should now be available. http://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA

The next meeting 20 July 2016, 11:00 AM AEST

Web Conference details:
Please join the meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/957666181

You can also dial in using your phone.
Australia +61 2 8355 1040

Access Code: 957-666-181
Don't forget the PA web meeting tomorrow!
